sentences.english: The whales expired with a rushing sound.
sentences.chinese: 那些鲸鱼呼气时发出一种急促的声音。

sentences.english: Whales and dolphins rely on their responsive hearing to interpret returning echolocation clicks.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼和海豚靠回声定位系统来辨别方向。

sentences.english: The other kind of whale is much larger than the killer whale .
sentences.chinese: 其他种类的鲸鱼要远远大于逆戟鲸。

sentences.english: Whales use their pectinate teeth to gather plankton.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼用牠们栉齿状的牙齿来捉浮游生物。

sentences.english: Once Hancock was summoned to the aid of a whale that had washed up on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 有一回，汉考克被人召唤去解救一头搁浅的鲸鱼。

sentences.english: Omeka is a public relations firm retained by Japan's Institute of Cetacean Research.
sentences.chinese: 奥莫卡是一家与日本鲸鱼研究学会保持联系的公司。

sentences.english: A marine biologist then sets out to destroy the creature by training two killer whales to go after the slimy menacer .
sentences.chinese: 一个航海专家开始训练两只鲸鱼去打败这只威胁者。

sentences.english: Archibaid was a whale at fishing in his young days。
sentences.chinese: 阿奇比德年轻时捕鱼捕到了一条鲸鱼。

sentences.english: MAR is a participant in the national whale disentanglement network.
sentences.chinese: 三月是一个在全国鲸鱼退纠缠网络参与者。

sentences.english: The whale only gets harpooned when he spouts.
sentences.chinese: 只有得到的鲸鱼时，他滔滔不绝地镖。

sentences.english: Whales have scales. If has to be in there.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼有鳞，如果必须有的话。

sentences.english: Personally I am not against whaling of non-threatened whales in limited numbers.
sentences.chinese: 我个人不反对捕杀限定数量的鲸鱼。

sentences.english: Researchers have long known that whales suffer blisters on their backs.
sentences.chinese: 研究者在很久以前就知道鲸鱼的后背上会起水疱。

sentences.english: And so we speak of interactions only with wild dolphin and whale pods .
sentences.chinese: 因此我们提到的交互是只和野生的海豚和鲸鱼圆荚体。

sentences.english: Dogs and horses raised in captivity are way better to eat than endangered whales poached from the wild.
sentences.chinese: 吃圈养的狗和马至少要比吃快绝种的鲸鱼好。

sentences.english: There is also an altar lamp burning whale oil.
sentences.chinese: 还有用鲸鱼油做成的长明灯。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
turtle/Internet slang for 海歸|海归[hai3 gui1]
